item.title: Submit an SSO OIDC integration
item.description: Submit a SSO OIDC integration Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: How to submit your SSO integration (including the test process) using the OIN Wizard Changes to be made: This is a really big how-to document. Bring in the flow diagram from “Publish an OIN integration” to the top of it to help give it some direction. Split out the update section to Publish > Update your integration Links to original docs: ‘+ https://developer.

item.title: Submit a LCM integration
item.description: Submit a lifecycle management integration Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: + Bring the flow diagram from “Publish an OIN integration” to the top to help give it some direction. Split out the update section to Publish > Update your integration Links to original docs: ‘- Submit an LCM integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-app/scim/main/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-app-overview/ (Submission process for SSO integrations) Structure type: Task

item.title: Submit an API service integration
item.description: Submit an API service integration Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: The bottom of the following doc has content related to submitting an API Service: Build an API service integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/build-api-integration/main/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-app-overview/ (Submission process for SSO integrations) Structure type: Task Content type: How-to: developer focused A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code.
